name: Magna
description:
After 2000 years rest you come back to... taxes?! Time to reclaim what's owed! Explore a near future bank, collect money to join it to yourself, reclaim the money owed to ancient spirits, become weightier to smash through levels and become gold once more!

Story

In the early ages, Magna was the god of money, recieving the forfeited money of the land in exchange for protection against the wrath of the gods. They were renowned for being made of solid gold and having a youthful appearance. After a long time in power, they went into a long rest, having served their time as the protector of the people.

Fast forward 2000 years, she's now out of slumber but much to her dismay, she's no longer gold and to further her disappointment, people aren't paying the gods, they're paying TAXES! In a fit of rage, its time for her to reclaim what's hers!

Gameplay

This is me!
As I collect gold, I'll gradually become golden once more!

Look at that!
With more gold on me, I'll be able to show these filthy people I mean business!

I'm even stronger!
Although I lose mobility with more gold absorbed into me, I'll be able to activate sensors and cash doors I wasn't able to before! Maybe I can go even further beyond?

It seems I can't jump as high now, maybe I should offload a bit of this?
